"Yes, I understand, and you are welcome abord, but Cliffjumper may 
need help confronting your former leader, and it sounds like you may 
have sound reasons to leave." and with that, he roars off into the 
direction of the radio transmission.

OOC: Whoever owns redhot, could you describe where I am going?
